item.title: 2024 Was the Year the Bottom Fell Out of the Games Industry
item.description: From layoffs to the return of Gamergate, video games—and the people who make and play them—had a rough year.

item.title: This Tropical Virus Is Spreading Out of the Amazon to the US and Europe
item.description: Oropouche virus has posed little threat outside South America in the past, but land-use change, the climate crisis, and international travel all appea...

item.title: OpenAI Upgrades Its Smartest AI Model With Improved Reasoning Skills
item.description: A day after Google announced its first model capable of reasoning over problems, OpenAI has upped the stakes with an improved version of its own.

item.title: I Used AI to Do All of My Holiday Shopping
item.description: Chatbots aren't very good at picking gifts, but that didn't stop me from burning the planet in a quest for the perfect baking equipment.

item.title: Why Can’t You Switch Seats in an Empty Airplane?
item.description: Yes, the weight distribution on an aircraft really does affect how well it flies. Our physics guy explains.
